review.room_type: Ph√≤ng Deluxe c√≥ Gi∆∞·ªùng C·ª° Queen Nh√¨n ra ƒê·∫°i d∆∞∆°ng
review.comment_positive:
I stayed here four nights with my husband and my parents (we checked-in on 21.03.23 and checked-our on 25.03.23). My parents are 86 and 80 years old. We stayed in 2 Deluxe Queen Ocean View rooms. First of all I would like to thank from my heart to All Staff of Vinpearl Resort Nha Trang. They were always so helpful, friendly and caring, especially to my parents. They made our family holiday more wonderful and unforgettable! My parents, my husband (German) and I were so happy and satisfied staying there. Secondly is that, the resort has all what we needed: we had fantastic ocean view from our balconies, the rooms were also super! The pools and beach were also perfect!
Only thing is that, the resort has no 2 room-villas for 4-persons family like us. Villas there are too big and not necessary for us. Therefore, we booked 2 rooms. The disadvantage of this is that, it is not so convenient for old guests to go out themselves with the elevator. I was worried when my parents went out the first time without us, because they were not getting used to elevator ‚ò∫Ô∏è. But they managed it. And at the lobby they always had someone to support them.
The resort is also just few minutes away from Vinwonders and offers free speed-boat each 30mins. Only if you want to go to the city center, you need to take taxi (but the receptionist will oder taxi for guests). 
(P/S no one from Staffs told us to rate the Resort with max point but I am doing that because they deserve it ‚ù§Ô∏è).

review.comment_positive: Vinpearl staff are absolutely some of the best staff I've experienced travelling not just in vietnam but anywhere I've travelled at all, they are extremely polite with great English and make everything super clear. I had a great time here with it being so easy to go to vinwonder and the pool and private beach being absolutely spectacular with a great view. I have 9/10 instead of 10/10 due to the fact the air-conditioning does not go below 25 degrees C which we confirmed with staff was the lowest it would go. Being from Australia I'm used to hot nights, but when paying the premium price vinpearl offer, I do not expect to wake up being too hot next to my partner, this just isn't a problem I've had with hotels I've paid half the price for. Other than that your definitely getting your moneys worth at this wonderful resort for a great experience.

review.rating: Beautiful hotel, inconvenient location, no good eating options
review.room_type: Bi·ªát Th·ª± 3 Ph√≤ng Ng·ªß Nh√¨n Ra ƒê·∫°i D∆∞∆°ng - H·ªì B∆°i Ri√™ng
review.comment_positive: Beautiful beach and swimming pools, we had a villa, it was very spacious.
review.comment_negative:
Very hard to get to this resort, need to take speed boat or cable car from Nha Trang. Cable cars were always busy so we only took speed boat. It runs every 30 minutes, so if you miss it, you need to wait another 30 mins. After the speedboat, you need to wait for the hotel car again to drive you to the resort. As we stayed at villa, we need to transfer to another car to drive us from the the main lobby of the hotel. 

Not so many eating options, we had dinner at Jasmine restaurant and the food was the worst we ever had in Vietnam. The breakfast buffet room was very busy, a lot of food choices but not high quality food. We had dinner buffet a few times and they let you pay at the entrance before you even start eating, then they chase you in the middle of dinner to pay for your drinks. They charges extra if you bring your own food to the hotel but they really have no options in the hotel. 

The staffs are friendly but a lot of them can‚Äôt speak English. This hotel seems like a destination for local people. 

One of our bedroom air conditioners was broken and one of the toilets was leaking during our stay, the water pressure is low in the villa and the water was not hot enough for shower.

Highly recommended to not stay at this resort!

review.comment_positive: I loved the location. The ocean views from my villa were amazing. The property is really well kept. Overall the staff were really helpful.
review.comment_negative: The frequency of the buggy and speedboat made it slightly difficult to commute daily with a small child. Service should be every 15 mins instead of 30 mins. When I compare the service to other luxury resorts where it fell down was due to the buffet service. The lady serving eggs was in an extremely upset mood and not happy to serve. Sadly, I noticed this every day of my stay and also noticed other unhappy guests. The dining area was not the cleanest and it took staff a long time to clean after guests finished at tables. The food was not replaced in trays quickly and you had to occasionally chase staff to give napkins, top up buffet trays. The coffee machine was broken in the dining area. A kid at the pancake counter stood there ate waffles, pancakes and kept dipping them again and again in the same chocolate sauce that all guests were meant to eat from. I raised this to a manager and requested them to replace the chocolate sauce. Staff should have been more attentive. I noticed when the bowl that was brought back at the counter was not a new bowl as I had seen the bowl when I handed it to staff and it had chocolate outside the bowl which existed even after they topped more sauce so sadly it was not attended to properly and in a clean manner. Also saw customers picking food with bare hands and putting them back such as bread etc. Staff need to be more present in the restaurant so hygiene levels are maintained.

review.comment_positive:
Overall we almost had a 10/10 stay. 

Check in - 7/10. It was a bit rushed on the mainland, which meant check in was not fully completed as it should have been, which resulted in miscommunication regarding payment. It was resolved. We also did not receive a welcome drink on arrival at Vinpearl on mainland, however saw other guests receive theirs.  We were advised that our bags would be delivered to our room in an hour. 3.5 hours later our bags were located as a result of persistence on our part to locate them. We were unable to use the pool/beach as our swimwear was in our bags.

Room - 10/10. We received a free upgrade. Thank you, our view of the sea from our room was a highlight.

Restaurant - 10/10. Lotus Restaurant ü™∑ serves an excellent range of dishes with a high standard of food taste and presentation. The restaurant staff are friendly and will stop to enquire about your dining experience (thank you Van, restaurant manager for your food and activities recommendations).

Added value - 10/10. I misplaced my mobile and Mr Hoang Nam (facilities manager at the mainland) and another very thorough staff member assisted in locating the device.
review.comment_negative: Transferring from mainland to island on jet boat was like herding cattle. The process lacked the personal touches we experienced during our first visit to the island 7 years ago. I believe this can lead to errors being made as we experienced.

review.comment_positive:
I would recommend to spend at least two nights here at the resort. It's worth the money. Breakfast is exceptional, so much food on offer, endless variety...

review.comment_positive: Beautiful resort, hotel was spotless and extravagant. Pool and beach are fantastic, lush flora surround all the paths and great to see huge jackfruit and other trees growing within the island displaying their fruits. The staff were extremely helpful and kind, very courteous and went above and beyond with any question or request we had, whenever they could. The ground staff, caretakers, cleaners and gardeners were equally friendly and courteous. In that heat with often labourous work, I was pleasantly surprised and It made for a nice atmosphere in all areas and prompted some conversations re: the island and the area and the developments ahead. My partner (VN) spoke and translated as we went. It was a lovely break from the chaos of the city centres, not a single horn was heard ü§£ ... with plenty of inspiration from across the world thrown in. So much to see and do, this is a place I'll have to revisit when I'm back to Nha Trang.

review.comment_positive:
Beautiful pool, kept spotless. Helpful and lovely 
staff, accommodating and friendly. Wifi excellent.
Large and comprehensive gym. Excellent room
service.
review.comment_negative:
Little choice in restaurants. Only 2 open. Expensive.
Buffet dinner option was very expensive per person
for family of 5. No stores 
for food or shops on island. Little to do if weather
is not good. Kids room for very young children only. 
Bowling closed. Other buildings deserted, like a 
ghost town, esp building where spa is. Beach board
walk cordoned off/broken. No tours available 
from the island. Safari, submarine, aquarium, 
snorkelljng activities not running. Vinpearl Wonders
like a ghost town also. Few snacks for kids between 
meals or as light snacks if you don‚Äôt want hot 
food from the menu. Rubbish washing up beach making
it unattractive

We had an amazing time at Vinpearl, and wish we had stayed longer! 
The staff went above and beyond for us, including assisting us to arrange an early airport transfer even providing breakfast boxes for us. 
Huey who was working at the lobby door was delightful to speak with, and provided us with great advice about the resort, Vinwonders as well as a brief history on Nha Trang. He was welcoming and a great representation for the resort. 
The breakfast buffet and room service was delicious!
review.comment_negative: The resort was overall fantastic, however we wish the pool was open a little bit later to enjoy it for longer!

review.rating: A lovely beachfront resort with excellent facilities
review.room_type: Ph√≤ng Deluxe 2 Gi∆∞·ªùng ƒê∆°n
review.comment_positive:
This resort is really beautiful, with stunning scenery and great facilities. Lovely white sand beach, huge pool and right on the seafront. The views from our room were so nice. 

The staff really take care of this place and are always cleaning, maintaining and improving (pool cleaning etc). 
The staff are very attentive also.

The resort itself is huge and airy. Corridors are wide and you never feel short of personal space. 

The bathroom is big and clean with nice products to use.
review.comment_negative:
The only thing is that you are not allowed to bring any snacks or drinks onto the resort. This would be fine if there was a mini-mart or snack kiosk, but there isn't. 

You can however get room service 24/7. But sometimes you may not wish to order a hot meal...

review.rating: 5 Star location but definitely not a 5 star hotel
review.room_type: Deluxe Gi∆∞·ªùng C·ª° Queen
review.comment_positive: Pool and Beach were nice, lifeguards were also very vigilant.
review.comment_negative:
Travelling to and from the island is horrible, twice while waiting to go over I was offered other people‚Äôs passports, our luggage was around 30 minutes late arriving and then the person delivering it went to give me someone else‚Äôs bag.
Bar in the middle of the pools often wasn‚Äôt staffed, at 1 point I walked up to the bar as the bar tender started to walk off and he just kept going when my husband stop him he said sorry I‚Äôm busy use the other one on the other side of the pools.
Drinks are more expensive than at the theme park and 3 times the normal price, no shop to buy snacks and a small menu of food options but you have to pay over 1,000,000VND if you want to bring any food with you.
kids playground near to pool is located between the baby pool and the deepest pool which isn‚Äôt safe and the other playground for kids is located next to the road where the carts constantly bring people down despite have a large grass area next to it away from the road.
When checking out they didn‚Äôt have any baggage  carts after the lobby and with a small child it was very difficult getting bags to the boat and then to the entrance where our car was meeting us, we asked if they had a try and he responded yes but no one to push it so we offered to push it ourselves but he still didn‚Äôt give us one.
Majority of staff were not very helpful, when I sent a message just after arriving about how stressful it was not having our passports and being offered other people the duty manager came to our room and apologised saying it was because they were at 50% capacity so I would hate to see in peak travel season how bad it is.
Food prices were ok, breakfast was good but the steak was the worse I have ever had anywhere even compared to our last hotel in Pang Rang.
